0.1.1.en: Added trigger flow cards for vehicle locked / unlocked and condition card for vehicle is / is not locked

0.1.2.en: Added condition card for any window or sunroof open

0.1.3.en: Added trigger cards for a window or sunroof open / closed and a door or deck lid open / closed

0.1.5.en: Failed data collection now retries on the next poll. Improved OAuth error report.

0.1.6.en: Added more logging to try and detect cause of failed connections.

0.1.7.en: Removed unused scopes. Added connection credentials stage to add device wizard

0.1.9.en: Replaced a scope that allowed the token refresh

1.0.1.en: Fix for high retry speed when API call fails. Added setting to device to control the polling interval.

1.0.2.en: 2nd Fix for high retry speed when API call fails.

1.0.3.en: Fix for path issues on HP2023.
